price: (Rántí) nígbà tí Olúwa rẹ̀ pè é ní àfonúfojì mímọ́, Tuwā.
arabic: إِذۡ نَادَىٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ بِٱلۡوَادِ ٱلۡمُقَدَّسِ طُوًى

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: idh nādāhu rabbuhu bil-wādi al-muqadasi ṭuwan
